name: Soul Traveller (0xspig)
description:
Web version may lag. Download for best results.

You are a tiny helpless wizard. You have no attack. You are pathetic... Luckily you can posses enemies to do your bidding. Fight your way to the castle and claim the crown.

Controls :

  • WASD - Move
  • RMB - Capture enemy
  • Q - Return to your own body
  • LMB - Attack
  • E - Open doors
  • P - Restart level
  • Esc - Menu
